steps.title: Add Items to Quotation
steps.content: This button, when clicked, allows you to add item(s) in the Quotation so selected.

steps.title: Assigning Item to an Employee/Department
steps.content: This button, when clicked, allows you assign an item to a specific Employee/Department, in the Quotation so selected.

steps.title: Incomplete 1
steps.content: This button, when clicked, do a MAGIC.

steps.title: Edit Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, allows us to edit the corresponding Item in 'Item' feild.

steps.title: Delete Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, deletes the corresponding Item from Quotation.
